section3.title: Hot Drinks Collection
section3.description: Macarons & Eugénie: Discover our new exclusive aromas inspired by the spirit of our signature hot drinks.

section6.title: DOLCI MONDO
section6.description:
Since 2010, Dolci Mondo represents excellence in oriental pastries
with a modern touch. We are a leading company, challenging every day
to combine tradition and innovation through our delicious creations.

section7.description:
Dolcimondo is a world of fine oriental pastries, combining traditional Arabic sweets
with modern French patisserie techniques. Each piece tells a story of creativity and quality,
made by skilled hands and hearts that love to create happiness.
